Class Hardward_Store_Software_Part1

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hardward_Store_Software_Part1

  • public class Hardward_Store_Software_Part1
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the files modification, menu, all the functions the modify the items on the inventory and inventory itself.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hardward_Store_Software_Part1() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static void addToInventory(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
      Checks the input ID # against the inventory list, if its there, lets the user choose the complete new quantity, if its not there, gathers all the necessary information to add it to the list
      (package private) static void checkByQuantity(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
      Gathers quantity input from user and outputs all items, and their quantities for what is equal too or below that quantity
      (package private) static void displayInventory(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
      Outputs the item inventory while formating it for the user to read easier
      (package private) static void itemSearch(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
      Checks through the inventory for any items that match the provided item or partial name to the item, and returns the current on-hands, prices, and ID number.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Reads in the inventory file, directs the menu, and writes back to the inventory file
      (package private) static void reduceOnHand(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
      Asks the item the user would like to reduce the on hand for, Checks that the item is on the inventory list, then allows the user to modify the inventory.

      • itemSearch

        static void itemSearch(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
        Checks through the inventory for any items that match the provided item or partial name to the item, and returns the current on-hands, prices, and ID number.
        Parameters:
        list - the arraylist to the inventory of all the items

      • reduceOnHand

        static void reduceOnHand(java.util.ArrayList<Inventory> list)
        Asks the item the user would like to reduce the on hand for, Checks that the item is on the inventory list, then allows the user to modify the inventory. Validates all data.
        Parameters:
        list - the arraylist to the item inventory.
